name: Back2Rehearsal
description:
School has started up again. So has the school band.
Well, time to go practice, eh?

You won't be alone, though. Someone will play a piece for you, and you will have to repeat it back to them.
Q: Bass Drum
W: Snare
E: Cymbal

Made in 3 hours for FNGJ 2021 Week 37

Credits:
